caption: In this episode, the group encounters a new mystery: how to commit murder in public. However, when they find the suspect, they discover he has already been murdered. Eventually, it is revealed he was killed by someone wearing an invisibility cloak. Highlights include the puzzle of committing murder in public, the suspect being killed by a person in an invisibility cloak, finding the suspect already murdered, the key to the plot being solving how the murder was committed, the female protagonist hoping the group can solve the mystery, the male protagonist eventually unraveling the puzzle, and the storyline being tense, thrilling, and full of suspense.
